data.question: Which Virginia discovery rule places no numerical cap on Requests for Admission about document authenticity?
Under the definition of inventory regarding computers, name two technical items that must be identified besides the computer's make and model.
data.answer: (i) the make/type of write-blocker used, and (ii) whether a hash verification was completed for each file and for the image as a whole.

data.question: Give two lawsuits listed under "Other Litigation" against Mr Depp and their informal labels.
data.answer:
- Eugene Arreola & Miguel Sanchez v. Depp: commonly referred to as the "security guard case"
- Gregg "Rocky" Brooks v. Depp: commonly referred to as the "movie-set assault case"

data.question: On what dates were Ms Heard's Nineteenth and Twentieth Sets of Requests for Production of Documents served?
data.answer:
Nineteenth Set: 10 January 2022
Twentieth Set: 2 February 2022
